context.p: You can upload one or more documents:

step.cmd: Click the Dashboard tool in the toolbar.
Click Upload in the tool menu.
step.stepresult: The Choose a folder to upload to... window appears.

step.cmd: Select the folder you want to upload to.
Select the document(s) you want to upload.
Click Open (Windows) or Choose for Upload (Mac).
If applicable, add a description and a status per document.

div.note: The available document statuses correspond to the project settings.

taskbody.result: A pop up window shows the upload progress and informs you that the documents are successfully uploaded.

postreq.note: As an alternative, you can first select a folder in the tool menu, before you click on Upload.
The maximum upload size is 20 GB.
If you want to upload a lot of documents simultaneously, you can use the Bricsys 24/7 Transfer Tool.
